ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen pink lemonade concentrate
des: "This summertime drink with pink lemonade, gin, ice cream, and strawberries is sure to help cool you down. Try it garnished with a dollop of whipped topping and a fanned strawberry."
ins: In a blender, combine pink lemonade, gin, ice cream, strawberries and ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve.
